definition[0]: a feeling of being comfortable, healthy, and happy
example[0]: A good meal promotes a feeling of well-being.
example[1]: the physical and emotional well-being of the children
example[2]: We are responsible for the care and well-being of all our patients.
definition[1]: the well-being of a country is the state in which it is strong and doing well
example[3]: We are now concerned for the economic well-being of the country.
